entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Ask your Ring Bearer Puzzle - Will you be Ring Bearer Jigsaw Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 7.99 - 15.99 (4 variants)

Ask your guy(s) to be in your wedding. Will you be my ring bearer puzzle? This adorable 4x6 inch puzzle asks your guy to be in your wedding in a cute and inexpensive way. Share a memory and a great keepsake. You can customize by adding a name (10 Letters Max including spaces) to the top of the image and personalizing the puzzle by selecting the "Personalize Name" option. 

If you choose to add the customized print option, we print in Segoe Script or Segoe Print text at our discretion. The finished size of the puzzle will be approximately 4x6 inches and may vary slightly in size, as each is individually hand cut. The puzzle will be packaged in a clear package with a business card and the puzzle. We can easily add names in pencil on the card to help you identify which puzzle goes to whom.

Have a special request? Not a problem. Simply contact us...

Are you looking for an adorable Bridesmaid or Flower Girl Puzzle?  Follow THIS LINK to design yours today!

entry.title: Custom Post Card Size Puzzles. Design your own puzzle with 6 pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 7.99

Do you need to stand out as a business? Your design on this wonderful Post Card Size Puzzle is a great promotional puzzle and quite affordable.  Add your logo, business information, new upcoming sales and give it to your clients and prospective clients.

Unique hand out at a networking event!

Fits nicely on your desk and looks amazing framed.  This thick and durable puzzle measures approximately 4 x 6 inches and features six oversized pieces. Own a personalized puzzle for a very low affordable price!  

This puzzle is packaged in a clear sealed sleeve.  ASK ABOUT OUR BULK PRICING for large orders.  We offer deep discounts on bulk orders.

entry.title: YOUR DESIGN on a SET of Custom Invitation Post Card Size Puzzles. SALE on 10 puzzles per Package.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 69.99

  • Your design on this set of wonderful Perfect Post Card Size Puzzles.  Design these puzzles and creatively use them as a unique birthday invitation,  Save The Date' puzzle notices for Weddings puzzles.  You can even design to ask your bridesmaids to be in your Wedding.

    Great gift's for classroom children from teachers and also PERFECT FOR TEACHER'S end of year gifts!

    Each of these thick and durable puzzles measures approximately 4 x 6 inches and have six oversized pieces. Come in sets of 10 for an incredibly low affordable price!  We print one design per set.

    Ideas for using Puzzles in your Wedding:

    • 'Save The Date' puzzle notices for your weddings
    • PERFECT Wedding Invitations.
    • Ask someone to be in your wedding as a bride's maid or flower girl. 
    • Great idea for a Wedding Favor! Unique gift idea.

    Each puzzle is packaged in a clear sealed sleeve.
